property.name: Rules
property.value: White spells you cast cost {W} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its stones seem to serve a healing function, but removing them intact is an exhausting process." - Tolarian research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In times like these, people need to be reminded of compassion." - Sisay

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {X}, {T}: Choose one - • Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Spend only white mana on X. • You gain X life. Spend only white mana on X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Healing is a gift the divine ones have shared with us. It is a sacred trust."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{G} +lt;I+gt;(You may pay an additional +lt;/I+gt;{1}{G}+lt;I+gt; as you cast this spell.)+lt;/I+gt; When Benalish Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The detailed dispatch could be summarized in four words: "Time is running out."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2}{W} +lt;I+gt;(You may pay an additional +lt;/I+gt;{2}{W}+lt;I+gt; as you cast this spell.)+lt;/I+gt; If Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm up here. You're down there. Now who's the lower life form?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An angel's sword impales only the body; her righteousness penetrates the soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Capashen Unicorn: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Capashen riders were stern and humorless even before their ancestral home was reduced to rubble.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red {W}: Target creature gains protection from red until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The faithful will walk through streams of fire and emerge unscathed. - Crimson acolyte creed

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from black Crusading Knight gets +1/+1 for each Swamp your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My only dream is to destroy the nightmares of others."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Separate all creature cards in your graveyard into two piles. Exile the pile of an opponent's choice and return the other to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a source would deal 4 or more damage to a permanent or player, that source deals 3 damage to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Serra's light isn't easily extinguished." - Reya Dawnbringer

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, separate all creatures that player controls into two piles. Only creatures in the pile of their choice can attack this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}: Glimmering Angel gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We turned to see where the blow came from and saw only a distant light." - Capashen lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses from the lands they control a land of each basic land type, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The earth shook, the sky rained fire, and it seemed the world was ending." - Benalish refugee

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Harsh Judgment enters the battlefield, choose a color. If an instant or sorcery spell of the chosen color would deal damage to you, it deals that damage to its controller instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Will history remember this as the day demons arrived or the day saviors arrived?" - Barrin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not everyone gets a second chance." - Hanna

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from black {W}: Target creature gains protection from black until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The truthful will stand in the gaze of death and escape unharmed. - Obsidian acolyte creed

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} as you cast this spell.) Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. If this spell was kicked, prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to that permanent or player this turn instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from the colors of permanents you control. This effect doesn't remove Pledge of Loyalty.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza convinced many Dominarians not only to set aside their differences, but to embrace them.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {1}, Pay 1 life: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice that shares a color with the mana spent on this activation cost. +lt;I+gt;(Colorless mana prevents no damage.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, destroy all Reflections. Then that player creates an X/X white Reflection creature token, where X is the mana value of that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Target creature blocks Rampant Elephant this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter how righteous the cause, it helps to bring along some muscle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do griffins fight to defend their homes or purely for sport?" - Sisay

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hanna would give up her own life before she'd abandon the Weatherlight." - Sisay

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As healers battled each plague, they learned more about the next.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything is in place. Nothing can happen that isn't part of my plan." - Urza

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A beacon of hope for a battered army.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Ruham Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as white is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice. Whenever damage from a black or red source is prevented this way this turn, you gain that much life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It could be worse," said Gerrard, looking around. "Well, maybe not."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a permanent of each color, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our victory must come from all of Dominaria, or it will not come." - Urza

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Target green or blue creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Domain - Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All Dominarians agreed on one thing: they would not go down without a fight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}{G}, {T}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. {U}{U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Destroy target enchantment. {3}{U}{U}: Counter target enchantment spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I do nothing else, I will protect my people." - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Wayfaring Giant gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its stature and stride increase with each step it takes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonland permanent if another permanent with the same name is on the battlefield. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Strength in numbers? I think not." - Gerrard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand if that permanent shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I think he sees more than he lets on." - Gerrard

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Breaking Wave as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Simultaneously untap all tapped creatures and tap all untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {X} for each creature they control that's attacking you, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Teferi wanted no part of Urza's battle plans, but both agreed the Phyrexian portal must be closed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return X target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard savored a grim smile as the Phyrexian portals disappeared behind the Weatherlight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether for good or ill, their arrival always means change.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}{U}, {T}: Gain control of target legendary permanent. +lt;I+gt;(This effect lasts indefinitely.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Above the waves you may be mighty indeed, but down here you belong to me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent As long as enchanted permanent is red or green, it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this permanent unless you pay its mana cost."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We define the boundaries of reality; they don't define us." - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target creature spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't have time for you right now." - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {3}{U} +lt;I+gt;(You may pay an additional +lt;/I+gt;{3}{U}+lt;I+gt; as you cast this spell.)+lt;/I+gt; If Faerie Squadron was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't cast spells that share a color with the spell most recently cast this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who know only one path to victory can never hope to triumph." - The Blind Seer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for three cards, exile them, then shuffle. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {X}{U}: You may put a creature card with mana value X from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, return Metathran Aerostat to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Metathran Transport can't be blocked by blue creatures. {U}: Target creature becomes blue until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rise, metathran. You shall serve a nobler cause in death." - Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land As Phantasmal Terrain enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Enchanted land is the chosen type.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} as you cast this spell.) Draw three cards, then discard two cards. If this spell was kicked, target player discards two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Counter target spell if its mana value is 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, counter that spell if its mana value is 4 or less instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player chooses one or more targets, each player reveals the top card of their library. The player who reveals the card with the highest mana value may change the target or targets. If two or more cards are tied for highest, the target or targets remain unchanged. Changing targets this way doesn't trigger abilities of permanents named Psychic Battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}: Rainbow Crow becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Children claim no two feathers are exactly the same color, then eagerly gather them for proof.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Blue spells you cast cost {U} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The subject's wings are clearly vestigial. We suspect the gems somehow keep it aloft." - Tolarian research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {U}: Return Shimmering Wings to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wings are but fins for swimming the sky." - Empress Galina

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This strange new beast makes for an excellent meal. Get me more." - Empress Galina

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Target white or black creature gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature. {B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. {B}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Any number of target creatures become the color of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I suggest you take a closer look." - Tidal visionary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell or ability an opponent controls that targets a land you control. If a permanent's ability is countered this way, destroy that permanent. Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature or land becomes tapped, put an hourglass counter on it. Each permanent with an hourglass counter on it doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, remove all hourglass counters from permanents that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath the waves, things appear the way merfolk want them to.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Flying {W}: Tower Drake gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Young tower drakes quickly learn to maneuver among Benalia's many spires.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature As Traveler's Cloak enters the battlefield, choose a land type. When Traveler's Cloak enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has landwalk of the chosen type. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vodalian Merchant enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not choosing sides in a war can be dangerous - but lucrative.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Return all permanents of the color of your choice to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rest now. You've neither won nor lost, but this battle is over for you just the same." - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to a creature by another creature if they share a color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I knew this day would come," said Urza. Looking at the destruction, Barrin sighed, "You don't have to revel in it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Zanam Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as blue is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a color. Target player reveals their hand and you choose a card of that color from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll wring out your tiny mind like a sponge." - Urborg witch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If this spell was kicked, Agonizing Demise deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Black spells you cast cost {B} more to cast. {B}: Andradite Leech gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Older specimens are completely encrusted with gems, which serve as both armor and weapons." - Tolarian research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever Yawgmoth marks, dies. There is no escape." - Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Urborg's magic is strong. Did Urza send you to protect us or to protect against us?" - Urborg witch, to Barrin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death's embrace need not be cold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, protection from white When Crypt Angel enters the battlefield, return target blue or red creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once an angel, now an abomination.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Misery, filth, disease - all things that bring suffering to the world - only make Phyrexians more dangerous.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature becomes black, gets +1/-1, and gains "{B}: Regenerate this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Serra's living warriors looked on in horror. "Where is our Lady now?" they cried.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a card name other than a basic land card name. Reveal the top seven cards of your library and put all of them with that name into your hand. Exile the rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Devouring Strossus.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Separate all creatures target player controls into two piles. Destroy all creatures in the pile of that player's choice. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature or land. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd strip away the world to see what's under it, but I'd never just leave it to these Phyrexian parasites and their false god." - Urborg witch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {3}{B} +lt;I+gt;(You may pay an additional +lt;/I+gt;{3}{B}+lt;I+gt; as you cast this spell.)+lt;/I+gt; If Duskwalker was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Domain - Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fouler than a necromancer's kiss. - Jamuraan expression

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Firescreamer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the dark, it's nearly invisible - until it exhales.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}: Regenerate Goham Djinn. Goham Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as black is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Target blue or red creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Target player discards a card. If this spell was kicked, that player discards three cards instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from white Marauding Knight gets +1/+1 for each Plains your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They ride our trails as if they were designed to," said the guard. "They were," replied Gerrard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-0. {B}: Return Mourning to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barrin waited for the nausea to pass or for Urza to say something else. He waited in vain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library. {R}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}{U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand. {R}{R}, {T}: Nightscape Master deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {B}: Phyrexian Battleflies gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After encountering them, Squee finally lost his appetite for bugs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phyrexian Delver enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}{U}: Exchange control of Phyrexian Infiltrator and target creature. +lt;I+gt;(This effect lasts indefinitely.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is Yawgmoth's will incarnate: an efficient machine that replaces inefficient flesh." - Tsabo Tavoc

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Phyrexian Reaper becomes blocked by a green creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It desires only to help others shed the itchy wet skin of life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Phyrexian Slayer becomes blocked by a white creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Benalia was only the first nation victimized by Tsabo Tavoc's specialized killers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Plague Spitter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. When Plague Spitter dies, it deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing is sacred to the rats. Everything is simply another meal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is such an exquisite sensation." - Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Barrin exhumed his daughter's body, he finally realized the full price of his faith in Urza.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Scavenged Weaponry enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Phyrexians have progressed," admired Urza. "Their parts are interchangeable."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spend only black and/or red mana on X. Soul Burn deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures that share a color with it. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cruelest strain of plague keeps its hosts alive long enough to return home and infect their families.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When Tainted Well enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land is a Swamp.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No, you get the water. I ain't thirsty." - Squee

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their arrival marks the end of Yawgmoth's subtlety." - Urza

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Destroy target creature if it shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature type. Target player reveals their hand and discards all creature cards of that type. Then destroy all creatures of that type that player controls. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Twilight's Call as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Twilight falls. We rise. - Necropolis inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{U} +lt;I+gt;(You may pay an additional +lt;/I+gt;{1}{U}+lt;I+gt; as you cast this spell.)+lt;/I+gt; When Urborg Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Urborg Phantom can't block. {U}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Urborg Phantom this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A chilling fog with teeth of ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A writhing mass of rot, with sharp claws and a vicious spirit.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: You can't cast more than one spell each turn. You may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Ancient Kavu becomes colorless until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those with the ability to change their nature survived Phyrexia's biological attacks. Everything else died.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player separates all nontoken lands they control into two piles. For each player, one of their piles is chosen by one of their opponents of their choice. Destroy all lands in the chosen piles. Tap all lands in the other piles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a source would deal 3 or less damage to Callous Giant, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The invasion has awoken slumbering mountains," noted Urza. "Good. We can use all the help we can get."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during combat after blockers are declared. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player gains 1 life for each basic land type among lands they control. Then Collapsing Borders deals 3 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Return Crown of Flames to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All my life I've fought these monsters. Today I finish that fight." - Barrin

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skilled ranger can glance at the mud on your boots and tell where you last camped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Ghitu Fire as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Ghitu Fire deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play with the top card of your library revealed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Isn't he on our side?" "Yep." "Why's he spyin' on us?" "Don't ask."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Halam Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as red is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Hooded Kavu gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spread of its hood eclipses all hope.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Kavu creatures have trample. Whenever another Kavu enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Kavu Monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kavu emerged all across Dominaria, but the first and the strongest came from Yavimaya.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kavu Runner has haste as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Kavu Scout gets +1/+0 for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kavu evolved for centuries deep inside Dominaria, and some can draw from its strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Dart deals 1 damage to target creature. If that creature is white or blue, Lightning Dart deals 4 damage to it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Broken and punctured by dozens of Phyrexian portals, the angry sky began to spit lightning back at the world.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Loafing Giant attacks or blocks, mill a card. If a land card was milled this way, prevent all combat damage Loafing Giant would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forget it. I'm not getting up today."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You and target spell's controller bid life. You start the bidding with a bid of 1. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid. If you win the bidding, counter that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember me?" Tahngarth roared. "Now I'll repay you for my stay on Rath"

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For his family, Barrin made a funeral pyre of Tolaria.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target artifact if its mana value is 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, destroy that artifact if its mana value is 5 or less instead.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {2}: Target black or green creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Rogue Kavu attacks alone, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know how this one feels," said Urza. "It's not like others of its kind and has been shunned for its differences."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Red spells you cast cost {R} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its gems didn't stop pulsating until they were completely removed." - Tolarian research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.) Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scarred Puma can't attack unless a black or green creature also attacks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not eager to lose the other eye.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Scorching Lava deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, that creature can't be regenerated this turn and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a color. Searing Rays deals damage to each player equal to the number of creatures of that color that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is a battle of pawns, for the highest stakes imaginable." - Urza

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{B} +lt;I+gt;(You may pay an additional +lt;/I+gt;{1}{B}+lt;I+gt; as you cast this spell.)+lt;/I+gt; When Shivan Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood of your ancestors ran heavy on this soil. Now it's your turn to sacrifice for the glory of Shiv." - Viashino heretic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skittish Kavu gets +1/+1 as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fierce when roused, this breed of kavu is easily distracted by a strong voice or melodic tune.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, if Skizzik wasn't kicked, sacrifice it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target land becomes a Swamp until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its slime liquefies the ground as efficiently as its fangs shred prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, for each defending player, separate all creatures that player controls into two piles and that player chooses one. Only creatures in the chosen piles can block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They certainly are well protected. Too bad for them they're not well balanced." - Sisay

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, tap all lands its controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Think of the problems we'll face if you uproot entire continents," said Urza. "I have," replied Teferi, "but the alternative is worse."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life. {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. {G}{G}, {T}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Tribal Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire is the universal language." - Jhoira, master artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player can't play lands this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't imagine how anyone lives in Shiv, let alone why they choose to stay." - Sisay

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.) This spell can't be countered. Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Viashino Grappler gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They've returned for the mana rig, but it no longer belongs to them." - Viashino bey

property.name: Rules
property.value: Zap deals 1 damage to any target. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All this time I thought Squee was useless," chuckled Sisay. "Who knew he'd be such a good shot?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of the wild, concentrated in a single charge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target activated ability. +lt;I+gt;(Mana abilities can't be targeted.)+lt;/I+gt; Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The battlefield is cluttered enough. Be still." - Multani, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mongoose blew out its candle and was asleep in bed before the room went dark." - Llanowar fable

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Canopy Surge deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature with flying and each player instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If you do, you skip your draw step this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For what are leaves but countless blades To fight a countless foe on high." - Skyshroud hymn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Phyrexians descended, Multani paused to reflect on the beauty that might never be seen again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No spot in nature is truly barren.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Green spells you cast cost {G} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It took magic to extract one of the stones and five people to carry it." - Tolarian research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. {G}: Kavu Chameleon becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They weren't part of my plan, but Gaea insisted." - Urza

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The appearance of the first kavu surprised Multani. As they continued to emerge, he no longer had any doubts about Yavimaya's ability to defend herself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield, its controller draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As a dark rain of Phyrexians fell from the sky, fountains of kavu erupted from the ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2}{G} +lt;I+gt;(You may pay an additional +lt;/I+gt;{2}{G}+lt;I+gt; as you cast this spell.)+lt;/I+gt; If Kavu Titan was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}: Llanowar Cavalry gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time, elves welcomed Benalish soldiers into the forest with something other than arrows.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {T}: Llanowar Vanguard gets +0/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Llanowar rallied around Eladamri's banner and united in his name.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Target red or white creature gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've journeyed across Dominaria. Phyrexians are everywhere. Plague is everywhere. There's no place left to hide."

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: If a basic land you control is tapped for mana, it produces mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gaea's memory is eternal, and she exists in all things." - Molimo, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Quirion Sentinel enters the battlefield, add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All elvenkind stood against Phyrexia. The Quirion nation deployed its most spiritual adepts, who wielded the power of their native soil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Quirion Trailblazer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All that matters is the path ahead."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Restock.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We hid such stockpiles all over Rath. We should continue that practice here." - Lin Sivvi

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rooting Kavu dies, you may exile it. If you do, shuffle all creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player kicks a spell, you create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My army took centuries to gather," remarked Urza. "Yavimaya seems to conjure hers out of thin air."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Saproling Symbiosis as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for any number of basic land cards, reveal those cards, then shuffle and put them on top.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have chosen my path. Who will walk it with me?" - Eladamri

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Serpentine Kavu gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Under Yavimaya's peaceful facade beat the hearts of many savage beasts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Sulam Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as green is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Each attacking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gaea battles rampant death with abundant life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Thicket Elemental enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}{R}, {T}: Thornscape Master deals 2 damage to target creature. {W}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The plagues robbed Dominaria of all but its dreams. Eladamri hoped dreams were enough.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Protected by druids for untold centuries, the forest began to return the favor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fruit of this fabled tree takes on the flavor of whatever food you love most.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.) Saproling creatures and other Treefolk creatures get +1/+1. When Verdeloth the Ancient enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{R} +lt;I+gt;(You may pay an additional +lt;/I+gt;{1}{R}+lt;I+gt; as you cast this spell.)+lt;/I+gt; When Verduran Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.) Target creature gains trample until end of turn. Whenever that creature deals combat damage this turn, if this spell was kicked, you gain life equal to that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target blue or black creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Yavimaya, flying low to join a battle can be a costly mistake.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - You gain 2 life for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.) {G}: Return Whip Silk to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Llanowar forges weapons of steel. Yavimaya grows her weapons within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, discard a card at random. If you discard a creature card this way, return it from your graveyard to the battlefield unless any player pays 5 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +0/+1. Sacrifice Angelic Shield: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If only an angel's wings could shelter us all." - Barrin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}{W}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. {1}{U}{U}: Armored Guardian gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that artifact's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From shards and splinters I call forth my living horde." - Molimo, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target enchantment. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that enchantment's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life can be found in all things, even things unnatural." - Multani, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gaea forged her soldiers into self-wielding weapons that struck down all impurities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target untapped creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to its controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Darigaaz decided his foe would be more useful as a weapon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Their controller chooses and sacrifices one of them. Return the other to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Whenever Blazing Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her leadership forged the Weatherlight's finest crew.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during combat. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They stop for nothing, not even the end of a battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Cinder Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {R}, Sacrifice Cinder Shade: It deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: You win the game if you control a land of each basic land type and a creature of each color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can build a perfect machine out of imperfect parts." - Urza

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Crosis, the Purger deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, choose a color, then that player reveals their hand and discards all cards of that color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Darigaaz, the Igniter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, choose a color, then that player reveals their hand and Darigaaz deals damage to the player equal to the number of cards of that color revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Dromar, the Banisher deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, choose a color, then return all creatures of that color to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: No more than one creature can attack each combat. No more than one creature can block each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You think you can stop me?" hissed Tsabo. "I think I can kill you," replied Gerrard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beneath her scars, Dominaria's beauty yet shines." - Multani, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Are they on our side?" asked Sisay. "If they kill Phyrexians they are," replied Gerrard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You helped save my people from a Phyrexian fate. Did you think I wouldn't return the favor?" - Eladamri, to Gerrard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Horned Cheetah deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I think she wants us to eat it," said Squee, staring at the oily carcass the cheetah had dragged to their fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}{G}, {T}: Exile Hunting Kavu and target creature without flying that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dominarians gladly fought alongside kavu . . . until the kavu figured out some Dominarians were quite tasty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {X}{2} +lt;I+gt;(You may pay an additional +lt;/I+gt;{X}{2}+lt;I+gt; as you cast this spell.)+lt;/I+gt; Flying When Kangee, Aerie Keeper enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, put X feather counters on it. Other Bird creatures get +1/+1 for each feather counter on Kangee, Aerie Keeper.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her armor and steed were borrowed, but her courage was hers alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}{G}, Discard two cards at random: Meteor Storm deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The storm wasn't an omen. It was the fulfillment of one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Noble Panther gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike many hunters, these panthers have no need for camouflage. They're fast enough to catch any prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Birds reach all parts of the world," said Barrin. "They will make excellent scouts."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced, and Overabundance deals 1 damage to the player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature and target land. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Breathe deep, Dominaria. Breathe deep and die." - Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Pyre Zombie is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}{B}. If you do, return Pyre Zombie to your hand. {1}{R}{R}, Sacrifice Pyre Zombie: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took Yavimaya a thousand years to breed them, but it took only seconds for them to prove their worth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Pay 2 life: Reckless Assault deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How will you fight an enemy that cares nothing for itself?" - The Blind Seer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anything sent into a plagued world is bound to come back infected.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top three cards of your library and put one of them into your hand. You gain life equal to that card's mana value. Put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Riptide Crab dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It sleeps with its claws open.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Rith, the Awakener deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, choose a color, then create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each permanent of that color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, protection from blue and from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They sneer at the terrestrial dangers found on peaks and shores, eager to prove themselves against new and even mightier foes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. {T}: Samite Archer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can preserve ten lives by taking one."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents play with their hands revealed. Sacrifice Seer's Vision: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barbarians long for a glorious death in battle. Phyrexia was eager to grant that wish.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hot wind whipped up as if the weather itself wanted to fight Phyrexians.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It winds its way through undergrowth as easily as it swims through shallows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, target player loses 1 life. Sacrifice Smoldering Tar: It deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during combat. Untap target creature you don't control and gain control of it. It gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it. If you do, you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{U}, {T}: Tap target creature. {3}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) {1}, Sacrifice Sterling Grove: Search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Teferi's Moat enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures of the chosen color without flying can't attack you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Isolation is not the answer." - Urza, to Teferi.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Treva, the Renewer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, choose a color, then you gain 1 life for each permanent of that color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, protection from legendary creatures {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target legendary creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I might almost pity my enemies - if it wasn't so amusing to watch them die."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Urborg Drake attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Relentless as the sea, remorseless as death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Vicious Kavu attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As battle raged in Shiv, a strange new ally appeared from below the ravaged ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay 1 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The plague moved faster than an army and was far more deadly.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every last one of you will become my servant. It's a shame you won't live to see the irony." - Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with mana value equal to that number. Then target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards with mana value equal to the number.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Voracious Cobra deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no known antidote for the cobra's venom . . . or its appetite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza knew Phyrexians would come through the air and sent his soldiers to greet them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all elves embrace the pastoral life. Some still roam the forest's edge, forever making war against their hated enemies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Yavimaya Kavu's power is equal to the number of red creatures on the battlefield. Yavimaya Kavu's toughness is equal to the number of green creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kavu hunt prey in packs - one kavu hunts a pack of prey.

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: As Alloy Golem enters the battlefield, choose a color. Alloy Golem is the chosen color. +lt;I+gt;(It's still an artifact.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We turned old weapons into new warriors." - Jhoira, master artificer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The stone whispers to me of dragon's fire and darkness. I wish I'd never pried it from the figurehead of that sunken Keldon longship." - Isel, master carver

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let insight and energy be your guides." - The Blind Seer, to Gerrard

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crosis is the eye of the ur-dragon, piercing illusion and darkness."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Darigaaz is the breath of the ur-dragon, burning away the burdens of mortality."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A strange skull was turned up by an Ephran farmer's plow. I traded a copper ring for the ‘ox skull.' It resonates of the sea and danger." - Isel, master carver

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dromar is the wings of the ur-dragon, sweeping away all opposition."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power 1 or less don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who can't survive are of no consequence." - Tsabo Tavoc

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lotus fields are too valuable to leave undefended.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your life was meaningless, but your death will glorify Yawgmoth." - Tsabo Tavoc

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's nothing I wouldn't give to achieve victory. Can you say the same?" - Tsabo Tavoc, to Gerrard

property.name: Rules
property.value: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sky split, and the air crackled and roiled. The Phyrexian invasion of Dominaria had finally begun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rith is the claw of the ur-dragon, scattering seeds of devastation."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Today a seashell fell from the empty sky here in Kinymu, a hundred leagues from the sea. I'm torn - shall I carve a woman or a bird?" - Isel, master carver

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Sparring Golem becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Part drill sergeant, part training dummy," thought Gerrard. "I hope it can stand up to a real war."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tek gets +0/+2 as long as you control a Plains, has flying as long as you control an Island, gets +2/+0 as long as you control a Swamp, has first strike as long as you control a Mountain, and has trample as long as you control a Forest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An elvish adventurer unearthed this stone in Jolrael's jungle. Now it's truly fit for display in one of her palaces." - Isel, master carver

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Treva is the voice of the ur-dragon, demanding cries of worship."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I found a troll-horn fragment in the wooded foothills of Hurloon, and it keeps growing larger. I wonder, is the horn recreating itself or the troll?" - Isel, master carver

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tsabo's Web enters the battlefield, draw a card. Each land with an activated ability that isn't a mana ability doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multicolored spells cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a tool for aiding my other tools," explained Urza. "Now they'll work in harmony."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ancient Spring enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {T}, Sacrifice Ancient Spring: Add {W}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Archaeological Dig: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Coastal Tower enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Capashen built the highest towers in Benalia to afford themselves the best view.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Llanowar has seven elfhames, or kingdoms, each with its own ruler. Their palaces are objects of awe, wonder, and envy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Geothermal Crevice enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {T}, Sacrifice Geothermal Crevice: Add {B}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Irrigation Ditch enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}. {T}, Sacrifice Irrigation Ditch: Add {G}{U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Keldon Necropolis deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Salt Marsh enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only death breeds in stagnant water. - Urborg saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sulfur Vent enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. {T}, Sacrifice Sulfur Vent: Add {U}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tinder Farm enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {T}, Sacrifice Tinder Farm: Add {R}{W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Urborg Volcano enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep in the heart of Urborg lie massive volcanoes whose thick black smoke covers the land with perpetual darkness.
